Class Employee

java.lang.Object
payrollsystem.Employee
Direct Known Subclasses:
FullTimeEmployee, PartTimeEmployee
public abstract class Employee extends Object
An abstract class representing an employee in the payroll system.

  • Constructor Details

    • Employee

      public Employee(String pName, String pNumber, String pPositionName, String pRank, String pDate, String pInsurance)
      Constructor for the payrollsystem.Employee class.
      Parameters:
      pName - the name of the employee
      pNumber - the phone number of the employee
      pPositionName - the position title of the employee
      pRank - the rank of the employee
      pDate - the date of the last promotion
      pInsurance - the level of health insurance

  • Method Details

    • getEmployeeId

      public int getEmployeeId()
      Gets the employee's ID.
      Returns:
      the unique employee ID, generated when the employee is created

    • getName

      public String getName()
      Gets the employee's name.
      Returns:
      the name of the employee

      public String getPhoneNumber()
      Gets the employee's phone number.
      Returns:
      the contact phone number of the employee

    • getPosition

      public Position getPosition()
      Gets the employee's position.
      Returns:
      the position object associated with the employee

    • getHealthInsurance

      public double getHealthInsurance()
      Gets the cost of the employee's health insurance.
      Returns:
      the monthly health insurance cost for the employee

    • getRank

      public int getRank()
      Gets the employee's current rank.
      Returns:
      the rank of the employee within their position's pay scale

    • getReachedTopOfScale

      public LocalDate getReachedTopOfScale()
      Gets the date when the employee reached the top of their salary scale.
      Returns:
      the date the employee reached the top rank, or null if not reached

    • getLastPromotionDate

      public LocalDate getLastPromotionDate()
      Gets the date of the employee's last promotion.
      Returns:
      the LocalDate object representing the last promotion date

    • getPromotionDue

      public Boolean getPromotionDue()
      Checks if the employee is eligible for a promotion.
      Returns:
      true if the employee is due for a promotion, false otherwise

    • getHistoricalPayslips

      public ArrayList<Payslip> getHistoricalPayslips()
      Gets the employee's historical payslips.
      Returns:
      a list of all payslips generated for the employee

    • getRole

      public String getRole()
      Gets the role of the employee based on their position and employment type.
      Returns:
      the role of the employee

      public void setPromotionDue(boolean b)
      Marks whether the employee is due for a promotion.
      Parameters:
      b - true if promotion is due, false otherwise

    • addPayslip

      public void addPayslip(Payslip p)
      Adds a payslip to the employee's historical records if it doesn't already exist.
      Parameters:
      p - the payslip to be added

    • calculateBasePay

      public abstract double calculateBasePay()
      Calculates the base pay of the employee. This method is implemented in subclasses for full-time and part-time employees.
      Returns:
      the base pay of the employee

    • incrementRank

      public void incrementRank()
      Increments the rank of the employee by 1. If the employee reaches the top of the pay scale, records the date they reached the top rank.

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Converts the employee object to a formatted string representation.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      a string containing the employee's details
